org.apache.taverna.wsdl.parser

Class TypeDescriptors

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.wsdl.parser.TypeDescriptors

  • public class TypeDescriptors
extends Object
    An utility class to construct WSDL type descriptors based on XML Schema.
    Author:
    Dmitry Repchevsky

        Builds a type descriptor for a "Literal" parameter.
